General.Name: Powerwell Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Powerwell Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the design, manufacture, and trading of electrical power distribution products in Malaysia, Bangladesh, Vietnam, Indonesia, Pakistan, Thailand, Singapore, Brunei, Cambodia, and Philippines. The company's products include low voltage main, sub, and distribution switchboards; and medium voltage switchgears and related products. It also provides engineering services, and property investment and management services. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Shah Alam, Malaysia. Powerwell Holdings Berhad operates as a subsidiary of PW Synergy Sdn. Bhd.
